![](http://blackcows.net/d.png)

Hey LET friends,

Black Cows is a Web hosting company comprised of people just like you. We are experts in "web hosting" and we love to make it simple for you. From the server to your website, we do it all.We are affordable, friendly and available at many locations worldwide assuring maximum uptime. 
We are inspired by the principles of transparency and reliability, in this huge web space, there are several websites which run on a motive to fool people by false advertising and other like means. The service advertised generally never meets the service offered. We have a clear aim to prevent such events and create a safer environment on this huge internet.
